 blit the contents of the draw buffer to the screen and toggle the draw buffers. It will prepare a freshly cleared drawing buffer for the next frame

Definition at line 370 of file eol_graphics.c.

eolUint eol_graphics_get_pixel ( SDL_Surface *  surface,
eolUint  x,
eolUint  y 
)

returns the hax color value of the pixel at the given position in the provided sdl surface. Note that the surface will need to be locked while this operation is being performed.

Parameters:
surface the sdl surface that holds the pixel data
x the x position to check
y the y position to check
Returns:
the hex color value of the color found.

Definition at line 401 of file eol_graphics.c.

void eol_graphics_register_resize ( void(*)(eolGraphicsView info)  callback  ) 

Sets up a function that will be called after any change to the internal graphics settings is made. It will call the function once to set up initial states.

Parameters:
callback the function to be invoked when the graphics are resized.

Returns:
the hex EOL_defined useful in direct graphics calls.
